Key Match Events: Doncic recorded a 30-point performance but fell short of victory due to a late controversial call and a last-second foul on Jusuf Nurkic.
Post-Match Reflections: Doncic was visibly frustrated and argued with officials after the game.
The 25-year-old Doncic showed signs of displeasure after setting up a crafty lob for Gafford to tie the game and then briefly limping before heading to the bench during the timeout.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Phoenix Suns secured a 114-113 win with a last-second foul on Jusuf Nurkic, which was converted into free throws by Nurkic.
The Suns built an early 36-26 lead in the first quarter, sinking eight three-pointers.
